class.comment: Represents a serialized message that can be sent to players or written to the console.

return.comment: The stream of the component and all of its children.

stream.comment: Gets a stream of the component and all of its children.

return.comment: An iterator over the component and all of its children.

iterator.comment: Gets an iterator over the component and all of its children.

return.comment: The style of this component. Returns a direct reference; changes to this style will modify the style of this component.

getStyle.comment: Gets the style of this component. Returns a direct reference; changes to this style will modify the style of this component.

getContents.comment: Gets the contents of this component.

return.comment: The plain text contained within this component.

getString.comment: Gets the plain text contained within this component.

return.comment: The plain text contained within this component.

getString.comment: Gets the plain text substring contained within this component with a specified stop index.

getSiblings.comment: Gets the components that this Component contains.

return.comment: A mutable copy of this component with all style removed.

plainCopy.comment: Creates a mutable copy of this component with all style removed.

return.comment: A mutable copy of this component.

copy.comment: Creates a muable copy of this component.

return.comment: The plain text contained within this component, in the visual order.

getVisualOrderText.comment: Gets the plain text contained within this component, in the visual order.
